main event: A civilian observed a very large, shiny, banana-shaped object for 13 seconds in Port Angeles, Washington.
interesting points: The object was shiny and banana-shaped with no sound,The sighting lasted for only 13 seconds,The object disappeared while the witness looked away to call a neighbor,The report suggests a possible hoax due to limited information,It is noted that there was no photograph included in the report.
sighted object: a very large, shiny, banana-shaped object
